title.narrative: Establishment of a National Financing Vehicle and capacity building program in Morocco

description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to mobilize subnational investments for climate projects, including the private sector. It is proposed to designate a NFV with the ability to include diverse national and local stakeholders and act as the national climate finance coordination body, to improve complementarity of projects (and avoid duplication), and to strengthen sub-national capacity to develop a pipeline of climate related projects that can be financed through the NFV.

This project aim is to secure GCF Readiness funding for the implementation of the two following components i.) Design a multi-sector National Financing Vehicle (NFV) to help territories (regions, provinces, and municipalities) access climate finance to support the implementation of Morocco’s National Sustainable Development Strategy (NSDS), NDC and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and ii.) Design a Regional Climate Finance Pipeline Development Capacity Building Program for the Climate Change Competency Center (4C) using a train-the-trainer approach so it can accompany the national and regional stakeholders in prioritizing and preparing bankable, sustainable and inclusive climate finance projects that will create a pipeline for financing in support of the GCF Country Programme.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04540 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: Morocco achieves development targets it has committed to in the NSDS, NDC and SDGs

description.narrative: NSDS, NDC, and SDG progress reports. GGGI Online only creates columns for a certain number of years, based on the start and end date of the project (2020 in the case of this PIN). Since most of these impact targets are for 2030 which are beyond the project end date, there wont actually be a "Target Yr X" column equating to 2030. To make sure we capture this useful text somewhere! Per warren, he suggests putting it here in this column instead.

title.narrative: - 20% recycled materials rate by 2020
- 50% wastewater reuse rate in inland cities by 2020
- 60% wastewater treatment rate by 2020
- closing the green investment gap of $24 billion in conditional investments
NDC targets of: - overall GHG emission reduction target of 42% below BAU emissions by 2030 - 23% energy savings in the transport sector by 2030
NSDS target of 20% energy savings by 2030
Pre resource mobilization preparatory work for NFV and Pipeline support conducted

description.narrative: Readiness funding proposal developed and submitted for GCF approval

title.narrative: Funds mobilized to design NFV and to design AREP Pipeline Development Capacity Building Program.
Entity managing the NFV secures first round capitalization for the NFV
Amount of financing for NFV approved by investors
Government approves the formal establishment of the NFV in a selected entity
Ministry of Finance approves the formal establishment of the NFV
Selected AREP develops a pipeline of projects for funding by the NFV or other sources
Number of concept notes developed by selected AREP, with assistance from GGGI
Design and implementation of AREP Pipeline Capacity Building program for Project Pipeline Development
